Package org.primaresearch.maths.geometry

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dimension
    Composed type for width and height.
    Geometry
    Helper class for different calculations
    Point
    Simple two-dimensional point.
    PointD
    Simple two-dimensional point with doubles.
    Polygon
    Polygon class holding a list of points and providing some geometric operations.
    Rect
    A simple rectangle.
